title: Best iPad mini (2024) screen protectors
description: Keep your Apple iPad Mini (2024) display safe and protected with these best screen protectors. The post Best iPad mini (2024) screen protectors appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Keep your Apple iPad Mini (2024) display safe and protected with these best screen protectors.
text: The new iPad mini is official as the mini version of the iPad is set to enter its seventh generation. It is a successor to the iPad mini released three years ago i.e. in 2021. However, there are only a handful of noteworthy changes like a new Apple A17 Pro processor and Apple Intelligence compatibility. Apple has kept the iPad mini display unchanged from the previous generation. It has an 8.3-inch Liquid Retina True Tone display with P3 wide color gamut support and anti-reflective coating. There is scratch-resistant glass but it is not something you should completely rely on. This is the reason you need a good quality screen protector to keep the display safe and protected. Check out these best iPad mini (2024) screen protectors you can grab. amFilm Screen Protector (2-pack) It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature micro-fiber cleaning cloth and plastic squeeze card. Sale JETech Screen Protector (2-pack) This is an affordable screen protector who do not want to go for something expensive. It offers a perfect fit for the iPad mini and complete coverage. You get two screen protectors with the package. Sale ProCase Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a protective folio screen protector with 9H hardness and full coverage. It has an ultrathin fillet and is highly responsive. It is easy to install with no worries about bubbles. It is shock-resistant, scratch-resistant, and liquid-resistant. Its advanced silicone adhesive ensures there is no residue when you are removing it. Sale Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away. This package has two screen protectors. Ailun Screen Protector (2-pack) This is 9H tempered glass screen protector with full-device coverage. It is anti-fingerprint and scratch proof which keeps the display protected. It protects from scrapes and bumps as well. You get two screen protectors with the package. ESR Screen Protector (2-pack) This ESR screen protector provides military-grade protection. It has micro-curved edges for a perfect fit. It offers HD display clarity even after application. It comes with an alignment frame that makes installation easy with no alignment issues. The package includes two screen protectors. Sale OMOTON Screen Protector (3-pack) This is a screen protector with 2.5D rounded design for comfortable gripping. It has 9H-rated hardness to keep the display protected from scratches. It will maintain the display quality and responsiveness. There is an oleophobic and hydrophobic coating. html:
The new iPad mini is official as the mini version of the iPad is set to enter its seventh generation. It is a successor to the iPad mini released three years ago i.e. in 2021. However, there are only a handful of noteworthy changes like a new Apple A17 Pro processor and Apple Intelligence compatibility.

Apple has kept the iPad mini display unchanged from the previous generation. It has an 8.3-inch Liquid Retina True Tone display with P3 wide color gamut support and anti-reflective coating. There is scratch-resistant glass but it is not something you should completely rely on.

This is the reason you need a good quality screen protector to keep the display safe and protected. Check out these best iPad mini (2024) screen protectors you can grab.

amFilm Screen Protector (2-pack)

It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature micro-fiber cleaning cloth and plastic squeeze card.

Sale

JETech Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is an affordable screen protector who do not want to go for something expensive. It offers a perfect fit for the iPad mini and complete coverage. You get two screen protectors with the package.

Sale

ProCase Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a protective folio screen protector with 9H hardness and full coverage. It has an ultrathin fillet and is highly responsive. It is easy to install with no worries about bubbles. It is shock-resistant, scratch-resistant, and liquid-resistant. Its advanced silicone adhesive ensures there is no residue when you are removing it.

Sale

Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector

This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away. This package has two screen protectors.

Ailun Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is 9H tempered glass screen protector with full-device coverage. It is anti-fingerprint and scratch proof which keeps the display protected. It protects from scrapes and bumps as well. You get two screen protectors with the package.

ESR Screen Protector (2-pack)

This ESR screen protector provides military-grade protection. It has micro-curved edges for a perfect fit. It offers HD display clarity even after application. It comes with an alignment frame that makes installation easy with no alignment issues. The package includes two screen protectors.

Sale

OMOTON Screen Protector (3-pack)

This is a screen protector with 2.5D rounded design for comfortable gripping. It has 9H-rated hardness to keep the display protected from scratches. It will maintain the display quality and responsiveness. There is an oleophobic and hydrophobic coating.

Note: This article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
